subject: Marathon Running
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Sunday is the last day to run a qualifying time of faster than 2 hours 22 minutes to earn a spot in the United States Olympic trials in the men’s marathon on Nov. 3.
snippet: Sunday is the last day to run a qualifying time of faster than 2 hours 22 minutes to earn a spot in the United States Olympic trials in the men’s marathon on Nov. 3.
